summary: Comprehensive testing of LegalMe AI chatbot app completed. All core features working: Home page with warm terracotta design, Chat with Gemini 2.5 Flash integration and Cursor-style markdown rendering, Contract analysis with PDF upload interface. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend navigation and UI working correctly.
passed_tests: All 7 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Home page loads with LegalMe title, hero section, and action cards
Start Chat button navigates to /chat page successfully
Upload Contract button navigates to /contract page successfully
All 4 topic cards present (Rental, Employment, Tax, Subscription Law)
Chat interface allows sending messages and receiving AI responses
AI responses include proper Cursor-style markdown formatting
AI responses contain clickable HTML links to German law references
AI responses always include Next Steps section at the end
Contract upload page displays with proper file input interface
Topic cards navigate to chat with initial topic messages
Responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Good accessibility with data-testid attributes on interactive elements
